comment: <url> to specify a url to test.
<key> to check. This is keyword to check if it exists in response.
when set --existkey, use this flag to indicate if it is a regular expression.
<number> in ms. To set crawling interval time in miliseconds.
<useragent> to indicate what ua you want to use. valid values: chrome(default), googlebot.
<mode> to indicate use what kind of cralwer to test. Browser is headless chrome. valid values: RAW(default), BROWSER, BOTH.
Show the result data for every crawling.
